import React from "react"; import Navigation from "../components/verticalNavigation/Navigation"; import Navbar from "../components/adminnavbar/Navbar"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function Ordermanagement() { const [show, setShow] = useState(null); const [orderlist, setorderlist] = useState([]); const [value, setvalue] = useState(); const orderdata = () => { axios .get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/order/orderplaced/") .then((Response) => { console.log("this is then"); console.log(Response.data); setorderlist(Response.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.log("this is catch"); console.log(console.log(error.data)); }); }; useEffect(() => { orderdata(); }, []); const orderstatuschanged=(id,value)=> { // setvalue(value); console.log(value) console.log(id) const data = { status: "item_shipped", orderid: "2022032176" }; axios .patch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/order/orderplaced/") // .then((Response) => { // console.log("this is then"); // console.log(Response.data); // }) // .catch((error) => { // console.log("this is catch"); // console.log(console.log(error.data)); // }); } return ( <>

{/*

*/} {/* */}
{orderlist.map((obj, index) => { return (
{/*

{obj.date}

); })}
); } export default Ordermanagement;
